stories.text:
Does she say, "My son created the color on the Start Button!" or, "My Daughter created the button that opens the Beast Limo that carries the President!!!!"

Just what does she say? I imagine the answers can be humorous!
stories.title: Ask HN: What does your Mom tell people about your work or employment?
Bees are now legally fish in the state of California

stories.text: So on Safari for MacOS, I usually use the Adguard for Safari extension. But I miss ublock origin. I have been playing around with the Orion (of Kagi search) fame since it will let me use Firefox or Chrome extensions, but I keep having this nagging feeling that we just need a Mac developer to port ublock origin and that will satisfy 99.99% of the folks who use Mac. So, what does it take to maintain a port over time, year after year?
stories.title: Ask HN: How hard would it be to port ublock origin to Mac Safari?
